span.span: Loads an assembly, and runs all the installers in it.

param.name: assemblyName

span.span: The assembly in which to search for installers.

summary.span: 检查是否可以安装指定的程序集。

span.span: Checks to see if the specified assembly can be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否可以安装指定的程序集。The method determines whether the specified assembly can be installed. 若要避免引发异常，该文件必须满足以下条件：To avoid an exception being thrown, the file must meet the following criteria: - 该文件存在。The file exists. - 该文件是.NET Framework 程序集。The file is a .NET Framework assembly. - 可以从文件读取的公共类型。The public types can be read from the file. - 没有至少一个公共的非抽象类，该类扩展类，其中包含属性。There is at least one public, non abstract class that extends the class and contains the attribute. - 可以创建每个安装程序实例。An instance of each installer can be created. > [!NOTE] > 如果该程序集有效，但未包含安装程序，将引发异常。If the assembly is valid but contains no installers, an exception is thrown. 此行为不同于在安装时，当它不是空的程序集安装错误。This behavior differs from that at install time, when it is not an error to install an empty assembly. ## Examples 在以下示例中，方法应用于这两个程序并不存在存在集和调用的结果显示到控制台。In the following example, the method is applied to both an existent and nonexistent assembly and the results of the call are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CPP/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CS/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/VB/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不能安装指定的程序集。

span.span: The specified assembly cannot be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当调用此方法方法的此实例中的所有安装程序成功。This method is called only if the methods of all the installers in this instance's succeed. 然后，此方法调用集合中每个安装程序的方法。This method then calls the method of each installer in the collection. 存储任何信息，您可能需要执行的正确卸载处于保存状态操作，它会传递给方法。Store any information that you might need to do a correct uninstall operation in the saved-state , which is passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数和并方法的类。The following example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods of the class. 类由调用创建构造函数。An class is created by invoking the constructor. 设置此对象的属性和并调用方法来安装`MyAssembly_Install.exe`程序集。The properties of this object are set and the and methods are called to install the `MyAssembly_Install.exe` assembly. summary.span: 获取安装程序集合中所有安装程序的帮助文字。

span.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

value.span: 安装程序集合，包括每个安装程序的执行和可以传递给和理解的每个安装程序 （适用于安装程序） 的命令行选项的说明中的所有安装程序帮助文本。

span.span: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what each installer does and the command-line options (for the installation program) that can be passed to and understood by each installer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用方法中包含每个安装程序的此实例的属性。This method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. 由指定的对象`savedState`参数更新以包含安装程序已运行之后反映的安装状态。The object specified by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run. 如果所有方法成功，调用方法。If all the methods succeed, the method is called. 否则为调用方法。Otherwise, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数和并方法的类。The following example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods of the class. 对象类由调用创建构造函数。An object of the class is created by invoking the constructor. 设置此对象的属性和和调用方法来安装 MyAssembly_Install.exe 程序集。The properties of this object are set and the and methods are called to install the 'MyAssembly_Install.exe' assembly. summary.span: 将计算机还原为在安装之前的状态。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回滚将计算机还原为安装发生之前的状态。A rollback restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation occurred. 仅当调用方法方法的实例，或在安装程序中的任何安装程序的集合无法正确运行。The method is called if the method of this instance or of any installer in the installer collection fails to run correctly. 通过调用生成的任何异常方法的集合中的安装程序将被忽略，和其他安装程序，回滚继续进行。Any exceptions generated by calling the method of an installer in the collection are ignored, and the rollback of the other installers continues. ## Examples 在以下示例中，调用方法来撤消指定的程序集上的安装过程。In the following sample, the method is called to undo the install process on the specified assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CPP/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CS/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/VB/assemblyinstaller_rollback.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed

param.span: ，其中包含计算机的安装后状态。

span.span: An that contains the post-installation state of the computer.
Removes an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法来删除以前已完成的安装。Call this method to remove a previously completed installation. 如果方法失败的集合中的安装程序之一，它仍然会调用其余的安装程序。If the method fails for one of the installers in the collection, it is still called for the remaining installers. 卸载失败不会不将计算机回滚到其卸载前的状态。A failed uninstallation does not roll back the computer to its pre-uninstallation state. > [!NOTE] > 尽管并方法在安装后保存计算机的状态文件包含从`savedState`参数可能已被删除在某个时间点安装完成后。Although the and methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete. 如果删除的文件，`savedState`参数是`null`。If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`. ## Examples 在以下示例中，安装后调用方法和提交该程序集作为参数传递给构造函数。In the following sample, the method is called after installing and committing the assembly passed as the parameter to the constructor. span.span: The exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.

exception.span: 但是，卸载完成后应用程序可能未完全卸载。

span.span: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstall completes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseNewContext { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否创建一个新对象的程序集的安装。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a new object for the assembly's installation.

value.span: 如果新对象应为程序集安装创建; 否则为。

span.span: if a new object should be created for the assembly's installation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`true`创建名为的新文件"{程序集名称}。InstallLog"记录消息，此程序集。Setting this property to `true` creates a new file named "{Assembly name}.InstallLog" to log messages for this assembly. 设置到`false`禁止创建新文件。Setting to `false` prevents the new file from being created. ## Examples 在以下示例中，通过调用创建构造函数。In the following example, an is created by invoking the constructor. 此对象的属性设置为`true`并上调用方法`MyAssembly_HelpText.exe`程序集。The property of this object is set to `true` and the method is invoked on the `MyAssembly_HelpText.exe` assembly. 因此，在控制台上显示的日志消息。Due to this, the log messages are displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CPP/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CS/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/VB/assemblyinstaller_helptext.vb#1)]
